channel.title: [718] Adding Dwarf Cannon, Gold Cannon & Royal Cannon
channel.description:
hello,
i am currently trying to add the 3 dwarf cannons into my 718 project im working on but i have a few errors.
im getting 5 errors that im confused about. ive been trying to fix this for 2 days now. i had 14 errors and im down to 5 now
here is the tutorial i used: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/snippets/516934-718-3-fully-working-dwarf-cannons.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/snippets/516934-718-3-fully-working-dwarf-cannons.html[/url]
and here are the errors im getting
[code] C:\Users\MARC\Desktop\my rsps\syclonepk\SyclonePK>echo off Building please wait... src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:3870: error: cannot find symbol public DwarfCannon getDwarfCannon() { ^ symbol: class DwarfCannon location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:418: error: cannot find symbol if (DwarfCannon == null) ^ symbol: variable DwarfCannon location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:419: error: cannot find symbol DwarfCannon = new DwarfCannon(this); ^ symbol: variable DwarfCannon location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:419: error: cannot find symbol DwarfCannon = new DwarfCannon(this); ^ symbol: class DwarfCannon location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:3871: error: cannot find symbol return DwarfCannon; ^ symbol: variable DwarfCannon location: class Player 5 errors Compiled. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: [718] Adding Dwarf Cannon, Gold Cannon & Royal Cannon
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:7, topic:543710”]Never defined a variable.

private DwarfCannon DwarfCannon; [/quote]
Also create this getter

public DwarfCannon getDwarfCannon() {
return DwarfCannon;
}

Read full topic
item.source: [718] Adding Dwarf Cannon, Gold Cannon & Royal Cannon

item.title: [718] Adding Dwarf Cannon, Gold Cannon & Royal Cannon
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Never defined a variable.

    private DwarfCannon DwarfCannon;

Read full topic

item.title: [718] Adding Dwarf Cannon, Gold Cannon & Royal Cannon
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

[quote=“qtst35, post:5, topic:543710”][quote author=IfearI link=topic=662588.msg4428560#msg4428560 date=1402042336]
You do have the DwarfCannon class already, right?

PS: Don’t have TeamViewer on this computer, do you happen to have skype?
[/quote]

i have the DwarfCannon.Java in the player>content folder[/quote]

Send me TeamView details please?

EDIT:
Fixed, package issue as well as confusion between starting with upper (class) and lower letter (variable).

Read full topic

item.title: [718] Adding Dwarf Cannon, Gold Cannon & Royal Cannon
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

[quote=“IfearI, post:2, topic:543710”](Rune-Server hates me, max number of posts I can view has been reached, forgot pw)

Anyway, The first error tells you it doesn’t know DwarfCannon. So either you didn’t create the class public class DwarfCannon { CODE HERE } OR you did it in a different package so you have to add DwarfCannon as an import so it knows what you’re talking about. If you’re using an IDE (Eclipse, Netbeans,…) it will greatly help you with that as it suggests fixes for most errors. (Makes finding what to import easy so recommended to use an IDE)

All other errors are basically the same reason, so import (at the top of the Player class, you should already see similar imports, now add an import to DwarfCannon).[/quote]

Thanks for replying so fast.

i am using eclipse but i dont know how to use it at all i only started using it yesterday.

anyways iv added

at the top of Player.Java

and now i have 6 errors

C:\Users\MARC\Desktop\my rsps\syclonepk\SyclonePK>echo off Building please wait... src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:51: error: cannot find symbol import com.rs.game.player.content.DwarfCannon; ^ symbol: class DwarfCannon location: package com.rs.game.player.content src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:3871: error: cannot find symbol public DwarfCannon getDwarfCannon() { ^ symbol: class DwarfCannon location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:419: error: cannot find symbol if (DwarfCannon == null) ^ symbol: variable DwarfCannon location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:420: error: cannot find symbol DwarfCannon = new DwarfCannon(this); ^ symbol: variable DwarfCannon location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:420: error: cannot find symbol DwarfCannon = new DwarfCannon(this); ^ symbol: class DwarfCannon location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\Player.java:3872: error: cannot find symbol return DwarfCannon; ^ symbol: variable DwarfCannon location: class Player 6 errors Compiled. Press any key to continue . . .

EDIT

i also have team viewer if you would like to take a look

Read full topic
item.source: [718] Adding Dwarf Cannon, Gold Cannon & Royal Cannon

item.title: [718] Adding Dwarf Cannon, Gold Cannon & Royal Cannon
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

(Rune-Server hates me, max number of posts I can view has been reached, forgot pw)

Anyway, The first error tells you it doesn’t know DwarfCannon. So either you didn’t create the class public class DwarfCannon { CODE HERE } OR you did it in a different package so you have to add DwarfCannon as an import so it knows what you’re talking about. If you’re using an IDE (Eclipse, Netbeans,…) it will greatly help you with that as it suggests fixes for most errors. (Makes finding what to import easy so recommended to use an IDE)

All other errors are basically the same reason, so import (at the top of the Player class, you should already see similar imports, now add an import to DwarfCannon).

Read full topic
item.source: [718] Adding Dwarf Cannon, Gold Cannon & Royal Cannon
